channel.title: "The Captain's AMERICA" Radio Show...
channel.description:
An American-Conservative-Independent-Patriot who is the host of "The Captain's AMERICA Radio Show" Nationally Syndicated Radio Show heard across America and around the World every weekend...
You can hear us streaming on the web Mon thru Fri 6-9 AM ET, 3-6 PM ET & 6-9 AM ET on Talkstream Live.com, Net Talk World.Talkspot.com, WTSA-IR.com, The Captain's AMERICA.Talkspot.com, The Conservative Talk Radio Network.com, Talk 2 K.com, Top Talk Radio.com and Liberty Bell Radio.com...
We feature the BEST Conservative Guests and Talk found anywhere on the radio dial and welcome you to listen LIVE online or via this Podcast...
We are also heard as a Pundit 3 times a week M-W-F on 99.9 WXJB-FM @ 0635 & 0835 AM ET with Mike Reeves and 'The Nature Coast Morning News' plus Wed mornings @ 0810 AM ET with Henry Raines on 1490 WWPR-AM opining on the news stories of the day. We can also be heard across America weekdays as a Political Pundit on some of America's great radio stations...
I served my Country in the Military and am a Vietnam Veteran, 25 year retired Fire-Rescue Captain who responded to the WTC on 9/11/2001 and have a son currently serving in the US Marine Corps...
To put it simply, we were Tea Party before Tea Party was ever COOL! Never wavering, not faltering in my American, Christian, Core, Conservative, Patriotic principles...
We are honored to have a very large Military, Patriotic, TEA Party audience listening to us every day via this Podcast and welcome all of you to 'chime-in'. Our Military is always invited to participate on our show and we feature LIVE interviews from our Military men and women serving in the Forward AOR's around the World in the Global war on Terror...
We are YOUR radio show and encourage ALL of you to participate in the show by email or via our Facebook page, "The Captain's AMERICA Radio Show" or to call our 24/7 comment line 941-580-9161 & tell us what's on your mind...
You'll hear more STIMULATING talk at your home of 'common sense' and we feature all the latest TEA Party News from TEA Party Groups across America, CENTCOM & USCG Guests & Reports, News Maker Guests, Intel Analyst Reports, Political Candidates & Pundits plus lots MORE...
See you on the Radio OR see you right HERE with this Podcast of our Radio Show! Become part of the SOLUTION and do not remain the PROBLEM we are all faced with in America today...
We also welcome all those TEA Party Groups across America to keep us informed. We have been dubbed the "VOICE of the TEA Party Movement along the Gold Coast of FL and beyond"...
We have MC'd and given speeches at numerous TEA Party Events all across FL plus even in Philadelphia, PA and Washington, DC...
Whether you're an EMT, Firefighter, Merchant Marine, Police Officer, Security Guard, Soldier, Sailor, Marine, Coast Guardsmen or in the Air Force, this Radio Show is dedicated to YOU and supports what each and every one of you do for America every day. We strive to deliver the POSITIVE message from those serving America and honor ALL of those who defend, protect and serve America keeping us free & safe...
We have been presented with several awards by both the DOD, Military Units and others for our help in getting the message from our Military men and women out to America and the World and are honored to have been chosen by the DOD to do so with our radio show...
Our Nationally Syndicated Weekend 3 hour Radio Show can be heard on the ABC Starguide Satellite, Liberty Bell Radio, New Media Journal Radio, Phoenix Broadcasting Talk Network, The Conservative Talk Radio Network, Top Talk Radio, Ghostfighter Radio, Red County, Talkstream Live, Talk 2 K Radio, WTSA-IR and over 50 other websites across America and around the World. You can check out our website: http://thecaptainsamerica.talkspot.com to find out how to listen to our web stream LIVE when the show's being broadcast on the air. Our Weekend radio show is syndicated by Dan Kiburtz of Phoenix Broadcasting in St Petersburg, FL...
I got my start in radio many years ago on the old 1260 WNDR Radio in Dewitt-Syracuse, NY as a "Teen Scene" Reporter and later became a weekend Radio News Reporter there while recovering from injuries suffered...
We were originally heard locally in FL on the radio weekly, then weekdays on 1280 WTMY, 1490 WWPR, 1220 WSRQ in the Bradenton-Sarasota, 1340 WTAN in Clearwater, 820 WWBA in Tampa, 1470 WMGG in Largo and now our Weekday Radio Show has grown into a 3 hour Nationally Syndicated weekend radio show...
I have also had the honor of being a guest on numerous local and national Radio and Television Shows, most recently on a FOX & Friends "Radio Rumble" segment, on the Genesis Communications Radio Stations and also as a guest commentator on radio stations like AM 970 & "AM Tampa Bay," AM 1450 WWJB & 99.9 FM WXJB on "The Nature Coast Morning News with Mike Reeves," we also appear weekly on "The Henry Raines Show" heard on AM 1490 WWPR as well talking about EMS-Firefighting, Homeland Security, Military, Political and TEA Party News...
"The Captain's AMERICA Radio Show" has grown consistently and is now heard on over 100 Radio Stations across America through syndication, around the World on the Internet on over 50 Internet Stations, on Satellite and also heard on Shortwave Radio...
Special thanks to the 30,000+ subscribers of our Radio Show Podcast from all sources including Facebook, Podomatic, Google Groups, Podcast Directories, Twitter, Yahoo Groups and Web Sites where our Radio Show Podcast is being played...
Folks there are Radio Stations who can't say they've got 30,000+ people listening to them so we really appreciate those who subscribe to and receive our podcast...
We also have started broadcasting on Blog Talk Radio, Mon-Thur 11a-12n PM EDT, and have quickly risen into the Top 100 Conservative Political Shows heard there and have had as many as 2,500 listeners tuning in online...
Our Radio Show Podcast has been frequently listed on the Podomatic "Movers & Shakers List" amongst the Top 50 Podcast's of the day...
You can also read my many written articles at Examiner.Com, News Sarasota Google Group, Newsbull.com, Newsbusters.com, Newsmax.com, New Media Journal.us, Red County.com, The Captain's AMERICA Newspaper, also on many other fine website's and in print around the World through syndication...
Listen to us on your I-Phone, I-Pad, I-Tunes, Windows Media, Real Player Network or your Wi-Fi car radio as well as numerous other websites all around the World...
Wi-Fi the new beginning for Radio now available across America and around the World. Both Chrysler Corporation, Mini Cooper & now selected Toyota cars come with Internet Radio available in their cars with more being added every year...
If your local Radio Station isn't carrying our Show, ask them to contact us and we'll tell them how easy it is to add our Show to their lineup at no cost to them. Just send an email to: thecaptainsamericaradioshow@gmail.com...
Give us a listen and you'll find out what you've been missing. Often imitated but never duplicated, we are the home of "more STIMULATING Talk and the original home of COMMON SENSE," now celebrating 10 years on the radio...
The Show Host, Matt Bruce, is a Retired Fire-Rescue Captain who was injured in the line of duty, a First Responder to the attacks of September 11th, 2001 at the World Trade Center in New York City, a former Town Tax Assessor who helped roll back the taxes in his Hometown during the 80's which resulted in the growth of not only the Town but also increased the tax rolls through new development and growth in the process and a Vietnam Veteran...
Matt Bruce is a no nonsense American Conservative Independent thinking Patriot who walks the walk and talks the talk. While others try to tear down America, we at "The Captain's AMERICA" support America and stand behind the core principles that our Country was founded on...
Show your support and get your Captain's AMERICA Patriotic Logo Gear perfect for gift giving, hats-teeshirts-polo shirts-coffee cups, just go to: http://www.cafepress.com/CaptainsAMERICA
Our Show Host, Matt Bruce, is also available for personal appearances or as an MC for your event. For more details, go to: http://www.thecaptainsamerica.talkspot.com website...
You can also invite us to broadcast LIVE from your TEA Party Rally or Event on the weekend by calling us & leaving a message at 941-580-9161 or 941-330-5988. For a nominal fee we can provide your weekend Event with a LIVE radio webstream of its own using our Internet resources...
God Bless America and ALL Those Who Defend, Protect and Serve Her Keeping All Of Us FREE & SAFE!
Thanks,
'The Captain'
Matt Bruce
Member 'The Patriot 100'... Member 'The Conservative Talk Radio Network'... Host of "The Captain's AMERICA Radio Show" heard weekends on over 100 radio stations...

item.title: The Captain's AMERICA Radio Show For June 4th - Who Made Things Worse???
item.description: "The Captain's AMERICA" Radio Show for Monday June 4th, featuring more STIMULATING talk at your home of "common sense" where we feature newsmaker guests, listener calls, the hottest news topics of the day & more... Today we start out with 'The Captain' as he opines about how who made things worse in America, the Democrats or the Republicans? 'The Captain' also talks about the reason why WI Gov Scott Walker will defeat the Recall Elction tomorrow and start a new wave of conservative excitement in America! Retired U.S. Army Major General Paul Vallely is next talking about our new Military presence coming to SE Asia, including Vietnam and the Middle East. Intel Analyst Ilana Freedman addresses the rash of Homegrown American Terrorists popping up on the radar and how they became Islamists. The Military All Stars Baseball team's Asst GM Jeff Gray drops by to talk about the Team as they start out their National Tour on June 6th. We add a little fun with earl Pitts-Redneck who'll have you laughing! Tell your friends to tune in and fin out what's really going on across America today and become part of the SOLUTION America needs... God Bless America! 'The Captain' Member Patriot Talking 100... Member Conservative Talk Radio Network... Have Lunch With 'The Captain' LIVE Weekdays 12n-1p EDT... We Will Be Broadcasting LIVE From The RNC Convention In Tampa...
item.dc:creator: Matt Bruce

item.title: The Captain's AMERICA - June 2nd, Weekend Syndicated Radio Show...
item.description: "The Captain's AMERICA" Radio Show, more STIMULATING talk at your home of "common sense" where we feature newsmaker guests, listener calls, the hottest news topics of the week & more as heard across America every weekend on our Network of 100+ Radio Stations... Guests during hour 1 include Frank Salvato-New Media Journal on the DOJ coming down against FL Voter Purging, Chris Markowski-'The Watchdog On Wall Street' about the grim Jobs & Economy reports for this week, Kate Nix from the Heritage Foundation presents a plan for streamlining Medicare and Kyle Warren-'The Professor Of Politics' reporting from CA on the WI Gov Recall Election plus Romney's surging in new polls. Hour 2 you'll hear guests Wayne Allyn Root-'Mr Libertarian' who speaks about the 9 reasons why Obama will lose in November. Kevin 'Coach' Collins- Author & retired NYPD Cop speaking about new Polling numbers coming out of the WI Gov Recall showing the Union losing dues paying members, Ryan Mauro-Intel Analyst from World Threats.com talks about Al-Qaida, Hamas, Hezbullah and powder keg steaming in the Middle East plus we finish the hour speaking with Alex Snitker-Former 2010 Libertarian US Senate Candidate in FL talking out Ron and Rand Paul's future in Politics. You'll also hear Earl Pitts-Redneck plus listeners calling in to the radio show... Tell your friends and become a regular listener of "The Captains AMERICA" Radio Show. Follow us on Facebook or Twitter as well, we are your radio show. Often immittated but never duplicated, we remain your home of "common sense" on the radio... God Bless America! 'The Captain' Member Patriot Talking 100... Member Consevative Talk Radio Network... Heard weekends across America on more than 100 radio stations... We Will Be Broadcasting Live From The GOP RNC Aug 27-30 In Tampa, FL...

item.title: The Captain's AMERICA Radio Show For May 31st - Dems Backtracking On WI Recall...
item.description: "The Captain's AMERICA" Radio Show for Thursday May 31st, featuring more STIMULATING talk at your home of "common sense" where we feature newsmaker guests, listener calls, the hottest news topics of the week & more... Today we start out with 'The Captain' as he opines about how the Democrats, led by their Chairwoman Debbie Wasserman-Schultz, are now backtracking about guaranteeing victor in the WI Gov Recall election. Conservative Author and former NY Congressman John LeBoutillier chimes in about Mitt Romney and what the GOP needs to do as they move forward towards the November election. Our Roving Reporter Don Baldauf shows up in Tallahassee and talks about the Politics involved inside FL and standing up for the Constitution. The Heritage Foundation's Morgan Roach joins us to talk about a new Terrorist threat coming from Nigeria which has roots to Islam and Al-Qaida. Tell your friends to tune in and fin out what's really going on across America today and become part of the SOLUTION America needs... God Bless America! 'The Captain' Member Patriot Talking 100... Member Conservative Talk Radio Network... Have Lunch With 'The Captain' LIVE Weekdays 12n-1p EDT... We Will Be Broadcasting LIVE From The RNC Convention In Tampa...

item.title: The Captain's AMERICA Radio Show For May 30th - Romney Seals The Deal...
item.description: "The Captain's AMERICA" Radio Show for Wednesday May 30th, featuring more STIMULATING talk at your home of "common sense" where we feature newsmaker guests, listener calls, the hottest news topics of the week & more... Today we start out with Frank Salvato - Managing Editor of the New Media Journal talking about the WI Gov recall election and Barack Obama losing support amongst 9 separate groups of voters. Then it's time for Wayne Allyn Root - 'Mr Libertarian' & 2008 VP Candidate talking about whwere Ron Paul goes from here. Bob Mazur - Author & former DEA Agent talks about Homeland Security issues and new threats coming from Nigeria and crossing the Atlantic to Mexico. Then we have a discussion with The Heritage Foundation about requiring Voter ID and why it's needed in America. We end today's show with Earl Pitts-Redneck and feature some Barack Obama parodies to help bring a smile to your day. Tell your friends to tune in and fin out what's really going on across America today and become part of the SOLUTION America needs... God Bless America! 'The Captain' Member Patriot Talking 100... Member Conservative Talk Radio Network... Have lunch with 'The Captain' LIVE weekdays 12n-1p EDT...

item.title: The Captain's AMERICA Radio Show For May 29th - Vets Getting Behind Romney...
item.description: "The Captain's AMERICA" Radio Show for Tuesday May 29th, featuring more STIMULATING talk at your home of "common sense" where we feature newsmaker guests, listener calls, the hottest news topics of the week & more... Today we start out with our 'Professor of Politics' Kyle Warren who has more info about CA Gov Jerry Brown's hard right turn in order to solve the financial issues in CA. Follow that with Sr Intel Analyst Ilana Freedman talking about a new Islamic Sect from Nigeria which MAY have infiltrated the Cruise Ship Industry and is opening up shop in MX. Next it's 'The Captain' as he opines about a large number of Military Veterans now getting behind Mitt Romney. This as more Polling data shows Obama's numbers are 'slip, slipping away.' We also visit with FL Gov Rick Scott who has some more interesting news about FL's job recovery and new businesses coming to the State. We end with earl Pitts-Redneck and feature some Barack Obama parodies to help bring a smile to your day. Tell your friends to tune in and fin out what's really going on across America today and become part of the SOLUTION America needs... God Bless America! 'The Captain' Member Patriot Talking 100... Member Conservative Talk Radio Network... Have lunch with 'The Captain' LIVE weekdays 12n-1p EDT...

item.title: The Captain's AMERICA Radio Show For May 28th - A Special Memorial Day Show...
item.description: Welcome to "The Captains AMERICA" Radio Show! Today we have 4 LIVE Military interviews from Bagram Airfield in Afghanistan with our brave men and women serving America in the Global War on Terror. We also feature a husband and wife couple serving together with the 82nd Airborne Combat Aviation Brigade. We honor the memory of all those who made the ultimate sacrifice this Memorial day 2012 so that we might be free and safe... We are your place to go when you need to know with Newsmaker Guests, LIVE Military Interviews from the forward AORs, Commentary and Conservative opinion of the days events. It doesnt matter if you're a Conservative, Democrat, Independent, Liberal, Libertarian, No Party Affiliation, Republican or whatever because we are ALL Americans and are in this together... Get involved in the process and help keep America the BEST place on Earth to live. This is YOUR radio show, tell your friends and follow us on Facebook, Twitter or right here on this Radio Show... God Bless America! Matt Bruce Ret Fire-Rescue Captain... Vietnam Veteran With A Son Serving In The USMC... Host of "The Captains AMERICA" & "Troop Talk Radio" Shows...

item.title: The Captain's AMERCA - May 26th, Weekend Syndicated Radio Show...
item.description: "The Captain's AMERICA" Radio Show, more STIMULATING talk at your home of "common sense" where we feature newsmaker guests, listener calls, the hottest news topics of the week & more as heard across America weekends on our Network of 100+ Radio Stations... Guests during hour 1 include Frank Salvato-New Media Journal on Obama's Class warfare, Chris Markowski-'The Watchdog On Wall Street' about the Budget Deficit & Debt Ceiling, Alex Snitker-Former 2010 Libertarian US Senate Candidate in FL talking out Ron and Rand Paul's future plus Kyle Warren-'The Professor Of Politics' reporting from CA on new legislation including some massive budget cuts followed by job layoffs and more tax hikes to close their $16 Billion Budget Gap. Hour 2 you'll hear guests Kevin 'Coach' Collins a retired NYPD Cop and Author speaking about new Polling numbers coming out of the WI Gov Recall, Bob Mazur-Author & Former DEA Agent on a new Nigerian Islamic Sect starting to show up on the Radar and 'some' of them may have infilitrated the Cruise Ship Industry as employees, Christian Ziegler-Executive Director of the Sarasota Republican Party talk about the battleground State of FL, Ryan Mauro-Intel Analyst ffrom World Threats.com talks about the Middle East volatility, Earl Pitts-Redneck plus listeners calling in to the radio show... Tell your friends and become a regular listener of "The Captains AMERICA" Radio Show. Follow us on Facebook or Twitter as well, we are your radio show. Often immittated but never duplicated, we remain your home of "common sense" on the radio... God Bless America! 'The Captain' Member Patriot Talking 100... Member Consevative Talk Radio Network... Heard weekends across America on more than 100 radio stations...

item.title: The Captain's AMERICA Radio Show For May 24th - Obama Now Said To Be "Fiscal Conservative"...
item.description: "The Captain's AMERICA" Radio Show for Thursday May 24th, featuring more STIMULATING talk at your home of "common sense" where we feature newsmaker guests, listener calls, the hottest news topics of the week & more... Today we start out with 'The Captain' as he opines about a new claim from the Progressive Left Liberal Media calling Barack Obama a "fiscal conservative." Wait until you hear the actual numbers that have taken us from a $4.9 Trillion Deficit under George W. Bush during 8 years to the $5.2 Trillion today under Barack Obama in 3 years. Conservative Author & Pundit John LeBoutillier is next talking about what the Romney Campaign will need to do to WIN. Former FL US Sen George LeMieux now running for the GOP Nomination in FL, joins us again to talk about the issues in this Senate Campaign and the stark differences between himself and the other Candidates. Tell your friends to tune in and fin out what's really going on across America today and become part of the SOLUTION America needs... God Bless America! 'The Captain' Member Patriot Talking 100... Member Conservative Talk Radio Network... Heard weekends across America on more than 100 radio stations...
item.dc:creator: Matt Bruce

item.title: The Captain's AMERICA Radio Show For May 23rd - Romney Gaining In Polls...
item.description: "The Captain's AMERICA" Radio Show for Wednesday May 23rd, featuring more STIMULATING talk at your home of "common sense" where we feature newsmaker guests, listener calls, the hottest news topics of the week & more... Today we start out with Frank Salvato-Managing Editor Of The New Media Journal, who talks about Barack Obama's 'Chicago Style' Politics now starting to hurt his campaign. Len Curry-Republican Party of FL Chairman talks about their gearing up for the RNC Presidential Convention in Tampa. Alex Snitker-2010 Libertarian US Senate Candidate talks about Ron Paul's future and why he won't endorse Libertarian Presidential Candidate Gary Johnson. Dick Morris talks about what it'll take to beat Obama in November & MORE... Tell your friends and become a regular listener of "The Captains AMERICA" Radio Show. Follow us on Facebook or Twitter as well, we are your radio show. Often immitated but never duplicated, we remain your home of "common sense" on the radio... God Bless America! 'The Captain' Member Patriot Talking 100... Member Conservative Talk Radio Network... Heard weekends across America on more than 100 radio stations...

item.title: The Captain's AMERICA Radio Show For May 22nd - The LOST Treaty & Why We Don't Need It...
item.description: "The Captain's AMERICA" Radio Show for Wednesday May 22nd, featuring more STIMULATING talk at your home of "common sense" where we feature newsmaker guests, listener calls, the hottest news topics of the week & more... Today we start out with 'The Captain' as he interviews USCG LCDR Neil Orlich from CG Air Station Clearwater talking about getting ready for the 2012 Hurricane Season which starts June 1st. Then we speak with Arthur Hayhoe, Executive Director of the FL Coalition On Gun Rights as he argues there being NO need for the "Stand Your Ground Law" in FL. Immediately afterwards we speak with Don Baldauf-Our Roving Reporter who has a concealed carry permit and disputes what Mr Hayhoe had to say with facts of his own. We finish up talk with Steve Groves from the Heritage Foundation about the "LOST Treaty" and why America should NOT be involved in it... Tell your friends and become a regular listener of "The Captains AMERICA" Radio Show. Follow us on Facebook or Twitter as well, we are your radio show. Often immitated but never duplicated, we remain your home of "common sense" on the radio... God Bless America! 'The Captain' Member Patriot Talking 100... Member Consevative Talk Radio Network... Heard weekends across America on more than 100 radio stations...

item.title: The Captain's AMERICA Radio Show For May 21st - Walker Will Beat WI Recall...
item.description: "The Captain's AMERICA" Radio Show for Wednesday May 21st, featuring more STIMULATING talk at your home of "common sense" where we feature newsmaker guests, listener calls, the hottest news topics of the week & more... Today we start out with 'The Captain' as he opines about WI Gov Scott Walker & predicts he will beat the Democrat Challenger in his Recall Election. The Unions have already borrowed and spent more than $30 million on this election. How's that working out for you my Union Brothers & Sisters? This will then set up the base for Barack Obama's defeat in November. The Heritage Foundation drops by to talk about Voter ID Laws that the DOJ doesn't want passed. Kyle Warren-The Professor Of Politics talks about CA Gov Jerry Brown having to make tough Budget Cuts and act like a Conservative instead of the Progressive Liberal he really is. US Sen Ron Johnson (R-WI) drops by talking about the Debt Ceiling which will once again take center stage as we approach to November Presidential Election. A 'line in the sand' has been drawn about having no more Budget Deficit increases and instead cutting spending... Tell your friends and become a regular listener of "The Captains AMERICA" Radio Show. Follow us on Facebook or Twitter as well, we are your radio show. Often immitated but never duplicated, we remain your home of "common sense" on the radio... God Bless America! 'The Captain' Member Patriot Talking 100... Member Consevative Talk Radio Network... Heard weekends across America on more than 100 radio stations...

item.title: The Captain's AMERICA - April 19th, Weekend Syndicated Radio Show - Obama's Career Dissipation Light Is Dimming...
item.description: "The Captain's AMERICA" Radio Show, more STIMULATING talk at your home of "common sense" where we feature newsmaker guests, listener calls, the hottest news topics of the week & more... Guests during hour 1 include Frank Salvato-New Media Journal on Chicago Style Politics, Chris Markowski-'The Watchdog On Wall Street' about the economy & taxes, Ilana Freedman-Sr Intel Analyst Gerard Direct on Homeland Security & tensions in the Middle East remaining high plus Kyle Warren-'The Professor Of Politics' reporting LIVE from the CA State Capitol in Sacramento reporting on new legislation including massive cuts followed by more tax hikes to close their $16 Billion Budget Gap. Hour 2 you'll hear guests Wayne Allyn Root-'Mr Libertarian' & 2008 Libertarian VP Candidate on why Ron Paul will not endorse Libertarian Pres Candidate Gary Johnson, Henry Raines-Progressive Moderate Talk Host on why Obama's Polling numbers are falling, Kevin 'Coach' Collins-Author & Former NYPD Cop on Black's and Latinos now becoming Republicans after Pres Obama came out in support of Gay Marriage, Alex Snitker-Liberty Takeover 2012.com Co Founder about a new wave in America of Conservative Independent Candidates hitting the campaign trail, Earl Pitts-Redneck plus listeners calling in to the radio show... Tell your friends and become a regular listener of "The Captains AMERICA" Radio Show. Follow us on Facebook or Twitter as well, we are your radio show. Often immittated but never duplicated, we remain your home of "common sense" on the radio... God Bless America! 'The Captain' Member Patriot Talking 100... Member Consevative Talk Radio Network... Heard weekends across America on more than 100 radio stations...

item.title: The Captain's AMERICA Radio Show For May 17th...
item.description: "The Captain's AMERICA" Radio Show for Wednesday May 17th, featuring more STIMULATING talk at your home of "common sense" where we feature newsmaker guests, listener calls, the hottest news topics of the week & more... Today we start out with 'The Captain' as he opines about Mitt Romney's visit to Tampa & the clock ticking on the 2012 Presidential Election with Barack Obama's career dissipation light getting 'dimmer'. Conbservative Author & Pundit John LeBoutillier is next and puts things into perspective. Henry Raines, Moderate Talk Radio Host, has a different view of what's causing Obama to slip in the polls. We finish with Bob Mazur talking about the latest violence along the Mexican Border and the Drugs plus Illegals still slipping into the USA.... item.title: The Captain's AMERICA Radio Show For May 15th...
item.description: "The Captain's AMERICA" Radio Show for Tuesday May 15th, featuring more STIMULATING talk at your home of "common sense" where we feature newsmaker guests, listener calls, the hottest news topics of the week & more... Today we start out with 'The Captain' talking why President Obama came out in favor of Gay marriage plus how 'dirty' this Presidential Campaign will get as Obama gets more DESPARATE to stay in office with the numbers now starting to turn AWAY from Barack Obama about his job performance and handling of the economy. We follow that with Kyle Warren-'The Professor Of Politics' LIVE from the CA State Capitol in Sacramento talking about the $8.3 Billion in Budget Cuts and what that means for the rest of the Country. Don Baldauf-Our Roving Reporter is next as he chimes in on the latest about FL Gov Rick Scott's Chief of Staff resigning and we finish with a LIVE call from Bagram in Afghanistan with US Army Capt Lisa Harris, a Flight Surgeon, serving with the 82nd Airborne... Tell your friends and become a regular listener of "The Captains AMERICA" Radio Show. Follow us on Facebook or Twitter as well, we are your radio show. Often immitated but never duplicated, we remain your home of "common sense" on the radio... God Bless America! 'The Captain' Member Patriot Talking 100... Member Consevative Talk Radio Network... Heard weekends across America on more than 100 radio stations...

item.title: The Captain's AMERICA Radio Show For May 14th...
item.description: "The Captain's AMERICA" Radio Show, more STIMULATING talk at your home of "common sense" where we feature newsmaker guests, listener calls, the hottest news topics of the week & more... Today we start out talking about FL Gov Rick Scott's Chief of Staff, Steve MacNamara, resigning over the weekend. We follow that with Alex Snitker-Libertarian talking about what Ron Paul's Plan is for the GOP and RNC Convention when it comes to Tampa, Who's being checked for their FL Voter certification? Sen Marco Rubio's new revised 'Dream Act' Bill, Bob Mazur-Author & Former DEA Agent talking about Homegrown Terrorists involved with the 'Occupy Movement' and a little chat about same sex 'Gay' marriage and what the real problem is... item.title: The Captain's AMERICA Radio Show For May 9th...
item.description: Hello and welcome to more STIMULATING talk at your home of "common sense." Join us today as we talk with special guest, Frank Salvato-Managing Editor New Media Journal, about Sen Dick Lugar defeated by TEA Party favorite Richard Mourdock, Same Sex Marriage defeated in NC & CO, WI Dem challenger set and it's a rematch of 2010 for WI Gov Scott Walker, Mitt Romney wins 3 more GOP Primary States & MORE. We feature newsmaker guests, military interviews, political talk, your phone calls & MORE... See you there! 'The Captain' Host of "The Captain's AMERICA" Radio Show...
